name: CirclesX 3 in 1
description:
Circles X requires quickness, reflex, carefulness, skill and more! If you trust your skills, Circles X is a minimal fun arcade game for you. Moreover it is a free arcade game...

Circles X has many different small and fun round-themed games. Compete with yourself and others in the score list, upset records!

Circles X is the beta version of the first game of the minimal series. It is quite fun and easy game. There are 3 different themes in the beta version for now. Themes will increase future updates.

Circles X Features ;

-Many mini-game content.
-Minimal design,
-Basic and fun game mechanic, only tap!
-Simple and intuitive user interface,
-Different list of scores for each mini-game,
